title: Bug 6304 cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When trying to sync a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not display the Team entry.
EB: I expect the context menu to display the Team entry when trying to sync a .java file and another resource.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the context menu while trying to sync a .java file and another resource
2. Observe that the Team entry is not displayed in the context menu
